mutants.code:
def findPermutation(s):
    l = r = 2
    n = len(s)
    min_arr = [0] * (n + 1)
    max_arr = [0] * (n + 1)
    for i in range(n):
        if s[i] == 'I':
            min_arr[i] = l
            max_arr[i] = r
            l += 1
            r += 1
        else:
            min_arr[i] = r
            max_arr[i] = l
            r -= 1
            l -= 1
    min_arr[-1] = l
    max_arr[-1] = r
    return (min_arr, max_arr)

            max_arr[i] = r
            l += 1
            r += -1
        else:
            min_arr[i] = r
            max_arr[i] = l
            r -= 1
            l -= 1
    min_arr[-1] = l
    max_arr[-1] = r
    return (min_arr, max_arr)
